DepEd: School year may open in August, IATF to decide on students' physical attendance tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734913 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/734913/deped-school-year-may-open-in-august-iatf-to-decide-on-students-physical-attendance/story/ The Department of Education (DepEd) on Tuesday said the academic year of 2020 may start in August instead of June due to the threat of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19). Tue, 21 Apr 2020 13:25:09 +0800

Tue, 21 Apr 2020 13:12:02 +0800
Duterte offering P10-M reward for any Filipino who can discover COVID-19 vaccine -- Roque tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734910 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/734910/duterte-offering-p10-m-reward-for-any-filipino-who-can-discover-covid-19-vaccine-roque/story/ “Inanunsyo po ng Pangulo na siya ay magbibigay ng pabuya na hanggang 10 milyong piso sa kahit sinong Pilipino na makakadiskubre ng vaccine laban sa COVID-19,” Duterte s spokesperson Harry Roque said in a televised briefing. Tue, 21 Apr 2020 13:10:40 +0800
WHO warns lifting of coronavirus lockdowns must be gradual tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734909 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/734909/who-warns-lifting-of-coronavirus-lockdowns-must-be-gradual/story/ Governments considering lifting lockdown measures should do so carefully and in stages, and continue to monitor the epidemic situation, said Takeshi Kasai, WHO Regional Director for the Western Pacific.So long as the coronavirus is circulating, no country is safe from a potentially overwhelming outbreak, he added. Tue, 21 Apr 2020 13:04:36 +0800
Public assured of continued COVID-19 testing despite limited RITM operations -- Nograles tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734907 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/734907/public-assured-of-continued-covid-19-testing-despite-limited-ritm-operations-nograles/story/ “We need to find health workers who are healthy, obviously not infected, who can come in to the RITM so that we can ensure that the RITM goes back to normal operations while we take care of the health workers ng RITM who were infected [with] COVID-19,” Cabinet Secretary Karlo Nograles said in a televised briefing. Tue, 21 Apr 2020 12:53:06 +0800

Tue, 21 Apr 2020 12:52:15 +0800

Tue, 21 Apr 2020 12:26:53 +0800
Zubiri donates plasma to PGH after defeating COVID-19 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734902 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/734902/zubiri-donates-plasma-to-pgh-after-defeating-covid-19/story/ "I was very lucky to have recovered with no complications but that is not the case for many other patients, whose bodies are less prepared to fight this disease. If plasma donations can help them in any way, then I am more than happy to offer mine," Senator Juan Miguel Zubiri said in a statement. Tue, 21 Apr 2020 12:24:27 +0800
